Title: normalizeUTF8NFKD
Description: Converts a string to NFKD normalized form, assuming the string is valid UTF8-encoded text.
String transformed to NFKD normalization form. String.
Examples: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFKD('â') AS nfkd, length(nfkd) AS nfkd_len;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFKD('â') AS nfkd, length(nfkd) AS nfkd_len;
